name: Stonks
points: Designed and implemented tool for managing personal investments portfolio in Go.
Created a command line user interface to create, configure, and analyze portfolio.
Optimized portfolio allocations based on user defined targets.

name: Simplex Algorithm Go (SAGo)
points: Implemented simplex algorithm in Go.
Created developer interface to abstract specifics of inequality constraints.
Set up Continuous Integration using GitHub Actions to automate testing and development workflow.

name: Branch Prediction Using Dynamically Trained Neural Networks
points: Paper investigating the effectiveness of using neural networks for branch prediction.
Wrote a modular branch prediction simulator in Python that allowed various branch prediction techniques.
Extracted branch prediction data from spec2k6 integer benchmarks.
Tested various branch prediction methods including various configurations of hashed perceptron predictors and feed forward neural networks.

name: Neural Evolution Of Feed-Forward Neural Networks
points: Paper investigating neural evolution networks.
Researched existing techniques used in structurally evolving neural networks.
Investigated capacity for such algorithms to learn strategies and learn in real-time.
Tested different algorithms on a simple task to observe how structures evolve.

name: Big Brain
points: Used Tensor-Flow to develop a recurrent neural network to generate fake spam emails.
Created proof of concept for AI generated text.
Additionally, trained AI on tweets to create a tweet generator.

name: Hangman AI
points: Created a hangman game using AngularJS which stored a database of words entered as words to guess.
Developed an algorithm to determine the most likely letter to appear based on length of given word, letter frequency, and word use frequency.
Bot undefeatable with greater-than-3 letter words after populating database with 20K words.

name: NotePadd
points: Developed a web - based application by implementing JavaScript to parse English text.
Created musical rhythms and flows by analyzing and interpreting sentences and word lengths.
Mapped notes to syllables in iambic pentameter to create musical melodies.
Designed and fabricated an intuitive, functional, and visually appealing user interface using Materialize CSS.

name: WatRGoose
points: Developed and published an Android application with a small team in the time span of 12 hours, being the only team to demo a project.
Collaboratively learned to use the Android Studio IDE and set up testing devices.
Experienced the process of publishing, updating, and fixing bugs across multiple devices.

name: Robotics Team
points: Designed a robot using Arduino and CAD in collaboration with a team of young engineers.
Implemented algorithms to make robot follow a strip which encodes audio, then play the audio encoded.
Won award for best chassis through excellent use of CAD and plasma cutting technology.

name: SHAD Entrepreneurship Cup
points: Collaboratively invented an innovative product to solve a novel societal problem.
Pitched product to a panel of seasoned professionals and entrepreneurs.
Created a business plan outlining the future growth of the company.
Prototype and presented a sample product.
Won first place for product and pitch in our region.
